body.p:
Commonwealth of Ky. Plff
Vs } Affidavit
Patrick Spielman Deft

The affiant Major John Peck states that he is in, the Military Service of the U. S. of America and is at present Commanding, the Post of Smithland Ky And upon taking Command of said Post he ordered all the Lewd women inhabiting the town to be arrested and brought before him Amongst the number was Mrs. A. E. Wilburn upon investigating the matter he ascertained her to be a woman of ill repute. and acknowledged herself openly that she was a lewd woman and such being the case she was ordered out of the lines.

John H. Peck
Major 137 Reg Ill Vol Infty
Comdg Post
Smithland Ky
Subscribed & Sworn to before me by John H Peck before me this 20th day of Aug 1864
